ygData.subject: Re: Unintelegable scrolls?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I don t know if you ll actually have to speak Orcish.. as I ve gotten scrolls from fire elementals :) what language do they speak!  I think the scrolls
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I don't know if you'll actually have to speak Orcish.. as I've gotten
scrolls from fire elementals :) what language do they speak! I think the
scrolls are in old erudian, that seems to be the prevalant language for
research, though I'm not positive.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Jan Sterken <jsterken@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 23, 1999 8:57 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Unintelegable scrolls?


>From: "Jan Sterken" <jsterken@...>
>
>Hail,
>
>I also have a question about unintelligible scrolls.
>
>When will I be able to use this? I think I need to speak the language of
>the creature I obtained it from (I got it from an Orc Oracle I slew in
>Crushbone) Will I also need the research skill.
>
>Assuming I need to learn Orcish, does anyone know where I can learn this
>foul language??
>
>Havil
>10th circle Wizard
>Servant of Mithaniel Marr
>Bristlbain Server
